src:
Hasil Kualifikasi Moto3 Malaysia: Marcos Ramirez Rebut Pole
02 Nov 2019, 12:31 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pebalap Leopard Racing, Marcos Ramirez, sukses mencatat waktu tercepat dan merebut pole dalam sesi kualifikasi (QP) Moto3 Malaysia di Sirkuit Sepang pada Sabtu (2/11/2019).
Pebalap Spanyol ini diikuti oleh pebalap SIC58 Squadra Corse, Tatsuki Suzuki, di posisi kedua dan pebalap Petronas Sprinta Racing, John McPhee, di posisi ketiga.
Sementara itu posisi keempat dan kelima masing-masing ditempati oleh pebalap Angel Nieto Team, Albert Arenas, dan pebalap Sky Racing VR46, Celestino Vietti.
Berikut hasil Kualifikasi Moto3 Malaysia 2019.
text:
Malaysian Moto3 Qualification Results: Marcos Ramirez Wins Pole
02 Nov 2019, 12:31 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Leopard Racing driver Marcos Ramirez successfully recorded the fastest time and won pole in the qualification session (QP) Moto3 Malaysia at the Sepang Circuit on Saturday (11/02/2019).
The Spaniard was followed by SIC58 Squadra Corse, Tatsuki Suzuki, in second place and Petronas Sprinta Racing, John McPhee, in third.
Meanwhile the fourth and fifth positions were respectively occupied by Angel Nieto Team rider, Albert Arenas, and Sky Racing VR46 rider Celestino Vietti.
Following are the results of the 2019 Moto3 Malaysia Qualifications.
